channel.title: Aegir on CoCitizen tech blog
channel.description: Recent content in Aegir on CoCitizen tech blog

item.title: hello world
item.description: The obligatory first post… There are many like it, but this one is mine. I’m Christopher, the CTO of CoCitizen. We’re a new startup based near Washington, DC. While the organization is new, my fellow co-citizens and I have been pursuing various technological innovation, international development and civic engagement projects throughout our careers. We don’t have a polished mission statement yet. But, we’re looking to start by making DemTools available to everyone.
